title: [Kraken's Fall, Beach]
description: Winding paths lead up over the high, grass-covered dunes that line the northern sections of the beach, while along the south the tide ebbs and flows in a rhythmic fashion.  Bamboo torches, tall and straight, burn with bright orange flames from their place just out beyond the tideline.  A spiraling wooden staircase winds its way from the ground to the second-story entry of a conical-roofed bungalow built on stilts, a wide sailcloth banner attached to its railings displays a bright red painting with tidy letters beneath.

Winding paths lead up over the high, grass-covered dunes that line the northern sections of the beach, while along the south the tide ebbs and flows in a rhythmic fashion.  Bamboo torches, tall and straight, stand dormant just out beyond the tideline, the sun-bleached lengths hardened and devoid of lacquer.  A spiraling wooden staircase winds its way from the ground to the second-story entry of a conical-roofed bungalow built on stilts, a wide sailcloth banner attached to its railings displays a bright red painting with tidy letters beneath.
